meanings.definition: The action of returning something to a former condition.
meanings.sent1: The restoration of the old house made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The restoration of the painting brought out its original colors.
meanings.sent3: The restoration of the antique clock turned back time in a way.
meanings.sent4: Her restoration of the garden was like a magical transformation.
meanings.sent5: The restoration of the ancient artifact was a true labor of love.

meanings.definition: The process of repairing or renovating something.
meanings.sent1: The restoration of the broken chair made it sturdy again.
meanings.sent2: Restoration of the roof was necessary after the storm damage.
meanings.sent3: The restoration of the torn book was a puzzle-solving adventure.
meanings.sent4: His restoration of the classic car was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The restoration of the historic building was a community effort.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing back or reinstating something.
meanings.sent1: The restoration of peace after the conflict was a relief.
meanings.sent2: The restoration of the old tradition brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The restoration of the lost key saved the day in the end.
meanings.sent4: Her restoration of trust in him was a slow but sure process.
meanings.sent5: The restoration of the missing painting was a triumph for the museum.
